TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HideModuleNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class HideModuleNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class HideModuleNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 屬性在套用到模組時，只能利用模組所需的限定性條件來存取模組成員。

span.span: The attribute, when applied to a module, allows the module members to be accessed using only the qualification needed for the module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可用於公開模組成員，而不會顯示模組本身。This attribute is useful for exposing module members without showing the module itself. 當使用 IntelliSense 在 Visual Studio 整合式開發環境 (IDE) 適用於 Visual Basic 中，模組就不會顯示在陳述式完成清單。When using IntelliSense in the Visual Studio Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for Visual Basic, the module does not show in the statement completion list. 相反地，IntelliSense 會顯示模組成員。Instead, IntelliSense shows the module members. 模組名稱隱藏的即使模組成員都是透過模組匯入仍然可以存取。Even when the module name is hidden, the module members are still accessible through the module. 如果與另一個識別碼，或使用另一個模組的成員，成員名稱相衝突`HideModuleNameAttribute`屬性，則該成員不會顯示在 IntelliSense 的模組層級。If a member name conflicts with another identifier or with a member of another module with the `HideModuleNameAttribute` attribute, then the member does not show in IntelliSense at the level of the module. ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用`HideModuleNameAttribute`資料庫將物件加入至屬性`My`，這可以透過存取`My.Database`。This example shows how to use the `HideModuleNameAttribute` attribute to add a Database object to `My`, which can be accessed through `My.Database`. [!code-vb[VbCnAttributes#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbCnAttributes/VB/Class2.vb#26)] `Namespace`陳述式必須出現在之外的任何類別或模組。The `Namespace` statement must appear outside of any classes or modules.

summary.span: 初始化 屬性的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the attribute.
